tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VitalSigns (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  body_temperature DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE health_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    height DECIMAL(5,2),
    bmi DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
  patient_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  temperature DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sleep_patterns (
  patient_id INT,
  sleep_duration INT,
  sleep_quality VARCHAR(20),
  bedtime TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE activity_level (
  patient_id INT,
  steps_count INT,
  calories_burned DECIMAL,
  activity_type VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medication_logs (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  date_taken DATE,
  time_taken TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id)
)
